description: Note: All of our current versions fully support ipad 3 smart cover sleep and wake feature.Some of our early batches may not support this function for ipad 3, please contact us for free exchange.Protect and enjoy your Apple iPad with this amCase PU Leather Flip Stand Case.Supports Sleep Mode- Close it, and iPad automatically goes to sleep. Open it, and iPad instantly wakes up - no need to press any buttons. This case doesn't just protect iPad, it keeps it ready to go whenever you are.Simple and Classic Design- Allow you to access all the iPad features without taking off the case. Easy to use while protecting your ipad completely.Two Functions, One Solution- Flip the case, and enjoy your ipad with 2 stand options. Whether you need a hand free media-viewing stand or a low angle typing stand, this is the right case for you.Your Satisfaction Is Our Commission- amCase products are committed to meet highest customer satisfaction. If you are not happy with the product by any means, please do not hesitate to contact us.
title: AM amCase Leather Case Cover and Flip Stand (Black) for Apple iPad 2/iPad 3/iPad 4 (the new iPad)--With Built-in Magnet for sleep/wake feature
